WorkItem.Description: I discovers a problem on the class PHPExcel_RichText on Excel5 writer with text in UTF-8 All is fine with this exemple : $oText = new PHPExcel_RichText();$oText->createText('my text in ');$oTextBold = $oText->createTextRun('bold with an accent');$oTextBold ->getFont()->setBold(true); $sheet->setCellValue('A1', $oText); But with this exemple, an Alert Security appears on Miscrosoft Excel : $oText = new PHPExcel_RichText();$oText->createText('mon texte en ');$oTextBold = $oText->createTextRun('gras avec un é');$oTextBold ->getFont()->setBold(true); $sheet->setCellValue('A1', $oText); Anyone have informations on this problem? PS : There is no problem with the Excel2007 writer, but it's not the solution because all users can't read xlsx.
WorkItem.Summary: Rich Text containing UTF-8 characters creating unreadable content with Excel5 Writer

Comments.Message: WIll push code fix to github tonight
